buttons.primary: flex min-w-[84px] max-w-[480px] cursor-pointer items-center justify-center overflow-hidden rounded-lg h-14 px-5 w-full
buttons.secondary: flex min-w-[84px] max-w-[480px] cursor-pointer items-center justify-center overflow-hidden rounded-lg h-14 px-5 w-full border-2 border-[#36e27b]

inputs.text: form-input flex w-full min-w-0 flex-1 resize-none overflow-hidden rounded-lg focus:outline-0 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#36e27b] border-none h-14 placeholder:text-[#95c6a9] p-4 pl-12 text-base font-normal leading-normal
